data.text:
1/3 This is the kind of #satellite data that as a researcher you wish to avoid in your life... 
The wildfires in #Euboea island, #Greece exhibited #pyroconvection for 6 consecutive days indicating the erratic behaviour of this #wildfires which are still raging out of control. https://t.co/6lGCgV1xoK
#NowWatching New IPCC report: More heat, more extreme weather events | DW News https://t.co/7r2y8OrQRd #globalwarming #heatwave #wildfires #floods
Turkey: Wildfires in Milas by İdil Toffolo #Turkeyisburning #wildfires  #Turkey #turkeyisonfire https://t.co/Pj0lMrraPk

The once green #Gokova bays located in Turkey's famous tourist hotspot #Bodrum turned black after being ravaged by #wildfires, as seen on Sunday.
#dronefootage #Turkey https://t.co/9h9mWJyfk2

Evia, Greece
A woman cradles a dog as forest fires sweep towards Pefki village
Photograph: Angelos Tzortzinis/AFP/Getty Images #Greece #wildfires #climate #environment #wildlife #IPCC https://t.co/2YT7Dxmpgm https://t.co/kKLvfpDIE3
The escalation of #wildfires in Greece,Turkey,Italy infact throughout Europe is alarming..have scientists ascertained the cause of such blazing inferno engulfing miles and miles of forests??

#Greece - Dozens of Nations Send Help To Battle Fires; #GreeceFires Continue to Burn for 7th Day; Settlements, villages, and towns continue to be evacuated, via @GreekReporter https://t.co/q6gC2StN4p #Greecewildfires #wildfires #ClimateCrisis #ClimateChange #news  #PrayForGreece

This is an interesting contrast to earlier work @FunEcology in the same system that showed that nocturnal pollen‐transport networks had lower complexity and robustness following #wildfires than at nearby unburned sites, with much less pollen transported https://t.co/8ZON10yjoS https://t.co/g3xcZIa8Ow

"At grief so deep the tongue must wag in vain; the language of our sense and memory lacks the vocabulary of such pain." Dante Alighieri Inferno
Photos from  Evia Island Greece, where the wildfires have burned to the ground 460.000 acres of land
#greeceisburning #evoia #wildfires https://t.co/2zKcAi7zln
